SELECT d.drug_code AS drugCode, d.drug_name AS drugName, d.unit_price As unitPrice, COALESCE(i.quantity, 0) AS totalQuantity, COALESCE(i.location, '-') AS location, i.expiry_date AS expirationDate, i.supplier AS supplier, i.item_id AS itemId, i.min_stock AS minStock FROM drug d LEFT JOIN inventory_item i ON TRIM(d.drug_name) = TRIM(i.item_name)
LEFT JOIN drug_check dc ON dc.drug_code = d.drug_code AND dc.check_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND dc.check_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) WHERE dc.check_id IS NULL
SELECT total_quantity FROM drug WHERE drug_code = #{drugCode}
